intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Coastal Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It provides detailed descriptions of all level 5 classes used in the Coastal Zones product, outlining their geographic characteristics, input datasets, and interpretation methods. The document aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in LC/LU mapping across European coastal regions, supporting the creation of reliable status maps and change layers for the reference years 2012 and 2018.
keywords: ETRS89 Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area projection
